LanguageData.CR_RaidCompressedMassageEnhanced: Compressed raider count from {0} to {1}, and enhanced {3} raiders. (Base multiplier: {2}x)
LanguageData.CR_RaidCompressedMassageNotEnhanced: Raid size has been compressed from {0} to {1}.
LanguageData.CR_InfoExcludedDrugs: [Elite Raid ] Info: The following drugs will be excluded from "Add Drug Effects".
LanguageData.CR_InfoMustNegativeEffectDrugs: [Elite Raid] Info: The following drugs will ignore "Avoid Negative Effects" and always apply negative effects.
